post.author: 이진경
post.content:
Job Profile
Advertisement number: 249954
Title: E-commerce (electronic commerce) software developer (VB.net ASP.net MCSD Certifed) (NOC: 2174)  
Terms of Employment: Permanent, Full Time, Day
Salary: $35,000.00 to $45,000.00 Yearly for 40 hours per week
Anticipated Start Date: As soon as possible  
Location: Toronto Centre, Ontario (2 vacancies)
Skill Requirements:  
  Education: Completion of college/CEGEP/vocational or technical training, Other: MCSD with at least exam 70-305/315 VB.net/VC#.net 1 of 70-306/316
Credentials (certificates, licences, memberships, courses, etc.): Other: MCSD
Experience: 1 - 2 years
Languages: Speak English, Read English, Write English, Other: Comfortable speaking with clients
Work Setting Experience: Consulting firm, Software developer
Operating Systems: MS Windows 95/98/NT/2000
Programming Languages: ASP, Visual Basic
Applications: MS Office
Management Systems (erp or db): MS SQL Server
Other: Object-Oriented design
Generic Skills: Computer use (ex., use software packages; knowledge of hardware; work with computer-operated machinery), Writing skills (ex., enter information on forms; write to inform, persuade, or analyze), Reading skills (ex., follow written directions; interpret documents like charts, maps; acquire specialized knowledge), Working with others (ex., work with individual or team; build consensus), Planning and organizing skills (ex., manage priorities; order tasks efficiently), Problem-solving skills (ex., identify problem causes; determine steps to resolve; assess solution), Speaking and listening skills (ex., communicate clearly and effectively; follow directions; mediate disputes)
Other Information: Designing solutions using web technologies: Windows Architecture. Experience with Interface design& development of database architectureASP, VB, VB.net, C#, ASP.netExchange, SharePoint, Commerce ServerMS Office/MS Project, MSDN. Excellent communication skills. Please send resumes in a Word attachment to jennifer@definityglobal.com

Employer: Definity Global Solutions Inc. (Placement Agency)

How to Apply:  By E-mail: jennifer@definityglobal.com

Business Profile: Our organization provides IT, Sales & Marketing and General Office staffing for a variety of industries.
Web Site: www.definityglobal.com
Advertised until: 2003/03/11
post.title: E-commerce (electronic commerce) software developer (VB.net ASP.net MCSD Certifed)
